# Vendor Index

This index tracks third-party vendors and their current usage status.

| Vendor | Purpose | Status | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Stripe | Payment processing | IN USE | Data processor for billing data. |
| SendGrid / SMTP provider | Email delivery | IN USE | Data processor for outbound email. |
| Twilio | SMS/voice services | NOT IN USE | This system does not use SMS/voice providers. See [Twilio incident response (N/A)](../runbooks/TWILIO_INCIDENT.md). |
